p: We enjoyed your show last week very much with Mr. Cavett. My Mother was born at Ft. Robinson and knew of Crazy Horse and Gen. Custer.

You spoke of belonging to the Omaha of Indian Wars. Perhaps you knew my grandfather, Col. Charles Taylor, of the 9th Cavalry. Red Cloud surrendered to him and he was a friend of Bill Cody's and Calamity Jane's.

My husband and I send money whenever we can to the Red Cloud Indian School in Pine Ridge, South Dakota as a token for the great wrong done to the American Indians. Their language and their religion is indeed noble and I hope can be perserved.
If you have time, I would love to hear from you, and especially if you remember my grandfather, Col. Taylor.
